name: Towards The Light (Kooroshoo, samangamestudio)
description:
Towards The Light is a 2D action side-scrolling runner game created for the Windows and Android platforms. In this endless runner you must survive by jumping, avoiding obstacles, and collecting items. It feature simple and beautiful graphics with original music.

Controls:
- D: Attack
- Space: Jump and Double Jump

Team:
- Kourosh Riahidehkordi (Programmer, Level Design)
- Saman Abutalebi (Game Design, Art and Music)
